explains: v. 管理，治理；执行，实施；给予（药物或治疗）；给予帮助，关心照顾（某人）；主持（仪式等）；<正式>踢，打；执行遗产管理人的职责
wordGroup: administer justice 执法，执行审判

sentences.en: The Council has plenary powers to administer the agreement.
sentences.cn: 理事会拥有全权执行这项协议。

sentences.en: He thinks the tax is impossible to administer.
sentences.cn: 他认为治税是不可能的。

sentences.en: The teacher has the authority to administer punishment.
